summary.description:
a GPU Accelerated FEM Tool for Forward and Inverse Computations in Matlab.

Open-source Python software for exploring, visualizing, and analyzing human neurophysiological data: MEG, EEG, sEEG, ECoG, and more.

Clean scripting & visualization.

Broad data format & analysis support.

||| COMMON LINK WITH (PUB. & NAME DIFFERENT) bio.tools/MNE-Python (MARTINOS.ORG/mne/stable).

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Zeffiro User Interface Electromagnetic Brain Imaging', 'Zeffiro', 'FEM' (bio.tools/fem), 'EEG'
summary.name: magnetoencephalography EEG
